ARABIC: فَٱدْخُلُوٓا۟ أَبْوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا فَلَبِئْسَ مَثْوَى ٱلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Enter the gates of Hell, remaining in it timelessly, for ever. How evil is the abode of the arrogant!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So enter the gates of Hell, and dwell there for ever. How dreadful a dwelling for the haughty!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Go now, and enter the gate of Hell, and abide in it for ever. " Evil indeed is the abode of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will be commanded to enter hell to live therein forever. How terrible will be the place of the proud ones!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “So now enter the gates of hell, remaining in it for ever”; so what an evil destination for the arrogant!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So enter the gates of Hell, to abide therein, and indeed, what an evil abode there is for the arrogant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore enter the gates of hell, to abide therein; so certainly evil is the dwelling place of the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So enter the gates of Gehenna, there to dwell forever.' Evil is the lodging of those that wax proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So enter the gates of hell, to dwell therein for ever. Woeful indeed will be the lodging of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so enter the gates of Hell. There you shall abide forever." Evil indeed is the abode of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Wherefore enter the portals of Hell as abiders therein. Vile is the abode of the arrogant
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Enter the gates of hell to remain in it [forever]. Evil is the [final] abode of the arrogant.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So enter the gates of Hell, to dwell therein. Thus evil indeed is the abode of the arrogant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So enter the gates of Hell, to abide therein, and indeed, what an evil abode will be for the arrogant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Enter the gates of Gehenna (Hell) to be in it for ever. Evil is the lodging of the proud.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Enter the gates of Hell, to dwell therein forever. Miserable is the residence of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and how wretched is the residence of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [16:29] And it will also be said to them: So enter the gates of Hell, to abide therein! Evil indeed is the lodging, the abode, of the arrogant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So enter the gates of hell, to dwell therein for ever) neither to die nor leave it. (Woeful indeed will be the lodging of the arrogant) the abode of the disbelievers is Gehenna.
